mapper.select: SELECT c.*, b.title AS title, b.nickName AS nickName, b.mid AS mid, b.content AS content, b.complaint AS complaint FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN board b ON c.partIdx = b.idx WHERE cpDate >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day) ORDER BY c.idx DESC LIMIT #{startIndexNo}, #{pageSize}

SELECT c.*, b.title AS title, b.nickName AS nickName, b.mid AS mid, b.content AS content, b.complaint AS complaint FROM complaint c LEFT JOIN board b ON c.partIdx = b.idx WHERE b.idx = #{partIdx} LIMIT 1;
SELECT *, (SELECT count(*) FROM complaint WHERE cpDate >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day)) AS newCount FROM complaint WHERE cpDate >= date_add(now(), interval -7 day) ORDER BY idx DESC LIMIT 1;
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET level = #{level} , userDel = 'OK', userDel = 'NO' WHERE idx = #{idx};
UPDATE board SET complaint = 'OK' WHERE idx = #{partIdx};
UPDATE complaint SET progress = #{flag} WHERE idx = #{idx};
